name: PerTenant Extension Rules
description: Professional PerTenant Extension ruleset for Business Central development

rules.justification: Do not create tables with IDs in the base application range
Do not create pages with IDs in the base application range
Do not create reports with IDs in the base application range
Do not create codeunits with IDs in the base application range
Do not create xmlports with IDs in the base application range
Do not create queries with IDs in the base application range
Use the PerTenantExtensionCop to catch extension issues
Do not modify the base application via direct object changes
Use event publishers in the base application
Follow proper dependency handling
Field extensions in tables should use proper AL syntax
Table relation extensions must be handled correctly
Extension objects must use the correct syntax
Extension objects must include proper documentation
Do not override fields from base application
Do not create procedures with the same name as procedures in the base application
Follow naming conventions for extension objects
Proper use of AppSourceCop for AppSource compatibility
Extensions should have proper upgrade code
Application areas must be set correctly
